response.summary:
Degree in Foreign Trade, with experience in banking, finance and products related to the banking sector, anti-money laundering management and financial sector risk analysis. Knowledge in processes and logistics of purchases in national and international markets. Professional, dynamic, and proactive. High degree of commitment to the achievement of goals and targets.

Credit Analyst | Payment Solution | Fintech | Banking | E-wallet | Compliance | Risk | Procurement | Operations | Transactions | Collection | Sanction | B2B | Onboarding

profile_positions.description: Review and analyze potential customers in quantitative (financial statements, projections, ratios, tendency, etc) and qualitative (experience in the industry, size of the company, management, etc) perspective. Strong relationship with the closest areas as Sales, Operations and Legal to kept them involve as needed. Credit interviews with clients over financial performance, projections, and additional documentation to support the process of decision. Monthly annual review of corporate customer payment, management situation, financial statements and others. Follow up conditions of credit lines approved. And support Credit Manager in audit process and special projects.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Credit Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Support credit, debit & prepaid cards.
- Support loan products.
- Support multiple schemes like Mastercard, Visa, Amex.
- Analyze websites and applications to determine if they are in compliance with the policies of the company and acquiring partners and do a complete review of the services and functionalities of the website and/or application for the purpose of credit card activation.
-Due diligence and Enhanced Due Diligence analysis.
-Anti Money Laundering investigation.
- Assess legal structure and business model of merchant in adherence to local and international legal framework, Visa & Mastercard regulations.
- Determine the risk prevention and mitigation measures for new projects.

profile_positions.description:
Analyze AML risk indicators for Citi Corporate clients in all regions, as part of the KYC (Know Your Customer) Standard, to ensure compliance with Citi Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Risk Policies, as well as country/local requirements. Provide accurate and timely delivery of the assigned work in terms of renewals, customer service and new-to-bank clients’ opportunities. Escalate and remediate data challenges that impact the on-boarding and renewal processes with Compliance and Technology teams. Support the operations manager regarding the daily and weekly production demand.

Gestión de análisis e investigación de riesgos anti lavado de dinero según las políticas que establece Citibank a nivel mundial

company.name: Coupa Software
company.description: Coupa Software is the cloud platform for business spend management (BSM). Coupa empowers companies around the world with the visibility and control they need to spend smarter and safer. To learn more about how Coupa can help you spend smarter, visit www.coupa.com.
